Paragraph: In our efforts to combat the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, various organizations are working together. The World Health Organization (WHO), the United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF), the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the National Institutes of Health (NIH), and the World Food Programme (WFP) are among the organizations involved. The United Nations (UN) is also a part of this collaborative effort.
